name: Isla del Sol - Sun Grown - Gran Corona
additionalNotes: Isla del Sol is a value-priced, coffee-infused cigar by Drew Estate. Handmade in Nicaragua, these beauties feature a nice blend of sandwich tobaccos infused with exotic Sumatran coffee bean. The flavors are rich and creamy boasting luscious notes of coffee and mocha. The sugar-dunked tip adds an extra layer of sweetness to this scrumptious, aromatic offering.
